extends Offer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SellOffer​(Asset asset, int quantity, float pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
    Constructor for trade offer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void resolveOffer()
    Deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit based on the pricePerUnit and the quantity bought or sold, as well as add the correct amount of assets bought or sold Also delete the offer if all the requested assets have been sold or purchased, otherwise update the offer [M]

    • SellOffer

      public SellOffer​(Asset asset, int quantity, float pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      asset - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The ID of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The ID of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

  • Method Details

      public void resolveOffer()
      Description copied from class: Offer
      Deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit based on the pricePerUnit and the quantity bought or sold, as well as add the correct amount of assets bought or sold Also delete the offer if all the requested assets have been sold or purchased, otherwise update the offer [M]
